Name: Hallowed Ground
Description: When resting, collect 2 Gold for each of your Acolytes here.

Name: Volcano
Description: Kill every Acolyte on or adjacent to this space.

Name: Market
Description: Discard cards from your hand. Collect 2 gold for each you discarded.

Name: Ruins
Description: Each opponent must give you one of their cards, or 2 money.

Name: Magnetic Maar
Description: Before scoring, move one loot token here and leave it here permanently. Include that loot token with your earnings for this rest.

Name: Tollbooth Tombolo
Description: Any time an Acolyte moves here, place 1 Gold from the bank here. When resting, collect all Gold here.

Name: Badlands
Description: When resting, move the Beast here. For each Acolyte this kills, collect 2 gold.

Name: Teleporter
Description: When resting, swap every Acolyte, Colossi, and Banner here with another space. Then score that other space.

Name: Speedy Slopes
Description: Before scoring your other Banners, you may move each of your Acolytes once. Update Banners as appropriate when you move Acolytes.

Name: Caverns
Description: Colossi can never enter this space. There can only be 3 Acolytes here at a time.

Name: The Void
Description: When resting, replace an Environment with a new random one. If your Banner is there, score it.

Name: Mountaintop of the Giants
Description: All Acolytes die here. But Colossi can be here.
